接口 ExcelExportService

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ExcelExportServiceImpl

    public interface ExcelExportService

    Title: Excel导出功能接口定义

    Description: Excel导出功能接口定义
    根据DataGrid导出数据

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015

    Company: Newtouch

    版本:
    1.0

    WangLijun
